alert.note: Alert for Pointe Coupee; West Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 6:02PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central West Feliciana and central Pointe Coupee Parishes through 645 PM CDT... At 602 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Morganza, or 8 miles northwest of New Roads, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Roads and Morganza. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
